title: MO State Courts Civil Rights Cases/Task Forces

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Missouri Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Court documents or court records related to complaint filings or lawsuit filings, prosecutions or convictions for cases related to civil rights violations filed against any local, state or federal law enforcement multi-jurisdictional task forces, committees, coalitions, councils or commissions operating in the state of Missouri. Please provide court documents or court records for the dates of July 1, 2020 to the date of this request filed in any Missouri Judicial Circuit Courts or Appellate District Courts. 

I also request that, if appropriate, fees be waived as I believe this request is in the public interest. The requested documents will be made available to the general public free of charge as part of the public information service at MuckRock.com, processed by a representative of the news media/press and is made in the process of news gathering and not for commercial usage.

In the event that fees cannot be waived, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kevin Hawkins

title: MO State Courts Civil Rights Cases

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Missouri Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Court documents or court records related to complaint filings or lawsuit filings, prosecutions or convictions related to cases for Conspiracy Against Rights and/or Deprivation of Rights Under Color of Law in the years of 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022 and 2023 filed in any Missouri Judicial Circuit Courts or Appellate District Courts relating to civil rights violations by employee(s) of Missouri law enforcement agencies or any other local, state or federal law enforcement agencies.

I also request that, if appropriate, fees be waived as I believe this request is in the public interest. The requested documents will be made available to the general public free of charge as part of the public information service at MuckRock.com, processed by a representative of the news media/press and is made in the process of news gathering and not for commercial usage.

In the event that fees cannot be waived, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kevin Hawkins
